snippet: Rafael Nadal, bidding for a record 49th claycourt crown, reached the final of the Barcelona Open for the ninth time by beating German Philipp Kohlschreiber 6-3 6-3 on Saturday....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal, bidding for a record 49th claycourt crown, reached the final of the Barcelona Open for the ninth time by beating German Philipp Kohlschreiber 6-3 6-3 on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Nadal Races Into Final as He Chases Vilas Record
headline.main: Nadal Races Into Final as He Chases Vilas Record
